title: The total package! Res Lease in San Marcos. 2 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: Check out this luxurious residential 2-story house in San Marcos, TX, featuring 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms just waiting for you to lease!!
You will love its spacious living room complete with pendant and recessed lighting, elegant floors, and an abundance of windows that make this home so warm and inviting.
The well-designed kitchen boasts granite countertops, wood cabinetry, plenty of storage space, and stainless steel appliances that are sure to make any home chef happy!!
The primary bedroom includes cozy carpeting for the coldest Texas months, an ensuite bathroom with a stylish white vanity, and a large tiled shower perfect for relaxing after a long day at work.
Don't miss out on seeing the beautiful front garden, with a well-manicured lawn that is perfect for your pets while you play with your furry friends!!
Schedule your tour today, this home will lease fast!!
(Application required before you can schedule a tour)
All renters are enrolled in the resident benefits package.
Do NOT reply to this ad, please call/text for a fast response.
Listed By: Benjamin Doherty, Sunroom Rentals Texas, LLC
